titles.title: Coastal Zone Management Act Reauthorization of 2003
To amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to authorize grants to coastal States under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Introduced. Coastal Zone Management Reauthorization Act of 2003 - Amends the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to reauthorize administrative matching grants to coastal States for the purpose of administering, amending, or modifying States' coastal zone management programs.Requires the Secretary to allocate funds to coastal States in an equitable manner which ensures that eligible coastal States receive increased funding for each fiscal year for which total program appropriations have increased.Earmarks certain funds to implement State coastal nonpoint pollution control programs.
